original_text: I, the Lord, have spoken, and I will surely do these things to this whole wicked community, which has banded together against me. They will meet their end in this wilderness; here they will die.”
korean_text: 나 여호와가 말하였거니와 모여 나를 거역하는 이 악한 온 회중에게 내가 반드시 이같이 행하리니 그들이 이 광야에서 소멸되어 거기서 죽으리라

sentences.original_text: and I will surely do these things
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 반드시 이 일들을 행하리라

sentences.original_text: which has banded together against me
They will meet their end in this wilderness
